      • nanoTime

        public abstract long nanoTime()
        Read cycle counter. This has the same semantics as System.nanoTime().
        Returns:
        current time in nanoseconds

      • nanosToMillis

        Converts nanoseconds to milliseconds
        Parameters:
        c - time in nanoseconds
        Returns:
        time in milliseconds

        Returns:
        time in seconds

        Returns:

        Returns:

      • cycles

        public abstract long cycles()
        Read the cycle counter
        Returns:
        number of cycles

      • perfEventInit

        public abstract void perfEventInit(String events)
        Initializes performance events.
        Parameters:
        events - the events to initialize. This is a comma-separated list of event names.

      • perfEventRead

        public abstract void perfEventRead(int counter,
                                   long[] values)
        Reads a performance event value.
        Parameters:
        counter - the event's id
        values - a buffer that will hold the return values of the read (3 64-bit values).
